JOB DESCRIPTION:
Excellent Programming Skills in C/ C++. 

Knowledge of Embedded System and Linux OS. 

Should have excellent debugging skills. Trainee Candidates will be trained for Embedded software Engineer during the training period and whoever showing good progress will be promoted as Embedded Software Engineer before the actual 4 months.
FUNCTIONAL AREA: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design
